product_name: REI Merino Wool Light Hiker II Socks - 2012 Seconds
long_description: Lightly cushioned, the REI Merino Wool Light Hiker II socks go from season to season-they keep your feet cool in the summer and warm in the winter. Made of merino lambswool with nylon and spandex for durability and dependable fit. Stretch nylon reinforces heel and toe area for ldurability and comfort; arch bands for additional support. Lin-Toe(R) ''no-feel'' seams keep socks smooth and nonirritating. Seconds; item has minor cosmetic imperfections that do not affect product performance.
short_description: Lightly cushioned, the REI Merino Wool Light Hiker II socks go from season to season-they keep your feet cool in the summer and warm in the winter.
